vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.2: Compiler is design for this case
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.4: select an area to include circuit
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.6: Now you get a compiler, which stores the circuit
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.8: Click with compiler you just got
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.9: Now it copies the circuit you just store
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.10: Input Link Port blocks of the original circuit
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.11: Is converted to circuit block's input ports
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.12: Output Link Port blocks of the original circuit
vscontrolcraft.ponder.circuit_0.text.13: Is converted to circuit block's output ports
